post.title: Who we are
post.body: We have over twenty years experience in business development in China. We have extensive experience in education, e-commerce, retail, real estate, and new business development. We have successfully started and run three of our own businesses in retail chain stores, education training, and internet companies. We have worked closely with many other small overseas businesses to open their China office and sell their products in China.

post.title: What we do
post.body:
We focus on helping medium and small businesses to penetrate China market, open local offices, and conduct marketing and sales in China. Our clients cover a wide range of areas including retail, e-commerce, education and training, real estate agent, and organic agriculture. We help our overseas clients in:
- China market analysis
- formulate business strategy for the China market
- discover the highest value opportunities in the context of our client's particular business in China
- open regional office in China
- facilitate their initial management and business operations in the areas of business registration, accounting, legal matters, employee hiring and employee benefits, marketing and sales, and government relations

post.body:
